column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4857_c0c115451bad24571303766f2fe6a6d44815b1c6/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
I think we should just remove this file. It's essentially an outdated design document for something nobody is currently working on.\n

I was just reading the documentation for fun and found it a bit distracting so I've fixed it. I'll not be making any further changes, so we can just close this pull request and I'll leave the rest up to you?\n

Well it isn't really outdated. The architecture is still as described in that document. Although a better place to have it would be as part of the class documentation (comments) in Doxygen, not a separate document.\n
But I agree on closing this pull.\n
